author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 27,623 students will sit for the SSLC examinations to be conducted in 71 centres here on Tuesday. They include 32 centres in Hosur education district, and 39 centres in Krishnagiri education district.

A total of 71 chief invigilators, 15 additional chief invigilators and 71 department officials are deployed for the exams.

As many as 1,594 invigilators will be deployed for monitoring the examinations inside the halls. In addition, 167 flying squads are deployed across the centres.

According to the administration, mobile health vans will also be on rounds to aid in the event of students falling sick during the exams.

Dharmapuri

A total of 24,731 students will take the SSLC exams from 74 examination centres in the district. About 1,750 invigilators will monitor the examination halls, and a total of 222 flying squads will monitor the conduct of exams across the centres.

In addition, 74 chief superintendents, 9 additional chief superintendents and 74 department officials have been deployed for monitoring.
title: SSLC exams begin today
